Detailed Description

Abstract base class for SocketEventListener. A SocketEventListener is notified on socket events.

See also:
Socket::SocketEventListener

Member Function Documentation

virtual void SocketEventListener::OnSocketEvent (  Socket::Event  event,
Socket *  socket
)  [pure virtual]
 

Is called on socket events when something with the socket happened, e.g. data can be read or data has been sent successfully.

See also:
Socket::Event
Parameters:
event Received event.
socket Socket that receives the event.
